title: Amazing Sunnyvale 1 Bed Apartment
posting_body: ['Miramar Plaza Apartments is a rarity in the Silicon Valley with all of its beautiful trees and well-manicured grounds.', 'Miramar Plaza is conveniently located in the middle of Silicon Valley.', 'You are close to all the big employers in the area like Google, Netflix, Apple, and eBay, additionally, anything else you could possibly want to do is probably no less than four hours away?', 'From skiing to surfing, it is all right here.', 'Miramar Plaza Apartments offers studios, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartments.', 'All of the units are large and most have been recently remodeled.', 'The apartments have balconies and patios which allow you to enjoy the beautiful summer evenings.', 'Professionally managed by Prodesse Property Group.', " Don't forget to ask about our move-in special!", 'Please reach out at', 'show contact info', 'to set up a tour.', 'MEDIA', 'If you are unable to view in person or want a sneak peak tour, please click/copy following links.', 'VIDEO:', 'https://youtu.be/gpUyiNrSNBU', '360 TOUR: <URL>', 'Layout will be the same but pictures are of similar apartment.', 'UNIT DETAILS', 'Rent: $2400.00 * See Lease Terms', 'Deposit:\xa0$600', 'Sq Footage:\xa0715 sqft.', 'Flooring: Carpet or Hardwood', 'Bedrooms:\xa01 Bed', 'Bathrooms:\xa01 Bath', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Carpet Flooring', 'Ample closets & storage space', 'Range / Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'Garbage disposal', 'USB Chargers in each room.', 'Balcony, Deck, or Patio', 'Cable-ready', 'LEASE TERMS', '12/14 month Lease: $2400.00', '6/9 month Lease: $2500.00', 'Utilities: Paid by Tenant', 'Security Deposit: $600.00', 'Application Fee: $30.00 per applicant, aged 18 and over', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES', 'Fitness center', 'Clubhouse', 'Playground', 'Laundry:\xa0Shared', 'Parking:\xa01 Carport | Plenty of Guest parking', 'Lease Duration:\xa012-14 Months (See Lease Terms)', 'Pets Policy:\xa0No Pets Allowed', 'CONTACT INFORMATION', 'Website: <URL>', 'Telephone:', 'show contact info']
